name: time-tracking-dashboard-widgets
title: Time Tracking Dashboard Widgets
description: A set of dashboard widgets for working with time tracking data from YouTrack. The set includes a widget for exporting work items and widgets for viewing personal work items and time tracking reports.

widgets.name: Personal Time Tracking
widgets.description: Displays daily and cumulative totals for spent time that you have added to issues in YouTrack.

widgets.name: Time Tracking Report
widgets.description: Display a report that tracks the amount of time spent working on issues in one or more YouTrack projects. This widget presents this data in the time report or timesheet report format.

widgets.name: Work Item Exporter
widgets.description: This widget provides an interface for exporting work item data from YouTrack. You can add this widget to dashboards and project overview pages in your YouTrack or Hub installation.
